import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { Form, Button,} from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' import { saveShippingAddress } from '../actions/cartActions' function ShippingScreen() { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const {shippingAddress} = cart const dispatch = useDispatch() const navigate = useNavigate() const [address, setAddress] = useState(shippingAddress.address) const [city, setCity] = useState(shippingAddress.city) const [postalCode, setPostalCode] = useState(shippingAddress.postalCode) const [country, setCountry] = useState(shippingAddress.country) const onSubmitHandler = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() dispatch(saveShippingAddress({address, city, postalCode, country})) navigate('/payment') } return (

Shipping

Address setAddress(e.target.value)} > City setCity(e.target.value)} > Postal Code setPostalCode(e.target.value)} > Country setCountry(e.target.value)} >
); } export default ShippingScreen
